locations: Vienna Concert Hall, Vienna, Austria::(Concert Hall)
imdb.plot outline: »Hollywood in Vienna« is a symphonic gala concert celebrating classic and current masterpieces of film music in the prestigious Wiener Konzerthaus (Vienna Concert Hall) in Vienna, capital of Austria. Within the course of each gala, the City of Vienna awards one of today's leading film music composers with the »Max Steiner Film Music Achievement Award«. The Max Steiner Film Music Achievement Award« 2013 was given to James Horner. The son of the Viennese stage designer and later Oscar-winning Hollywood set designer Harry Horner belongs to today's best known and most versatile film composers. His awards include two Academy Awards, seven Oscar nominations, two Golden Globe Awards (eight nominations) and three Grammy Awards (eight nominations). During the gala concert James Horner's musical highlights, like »Titanic«, »Avatar«, »Star Trek« and more were performed.
imdb.title: Hollywood in Vienna 2013: A Tribute to James Horner
akas: Hollywood in Vienna 2013: A Tribute to James Horner (Austria)
plot: »Hollywood in Vienna« is a symphonic gala concert celebrating classic and current masterpieces of film music in the prestigious Wiener Konzerthaus (Vienna Concert Hall) in Vienna, capital of Austria. Within the course of each gala, the City of Vienna awards one of today's leading film music composers with the »Max Steiner Film Music Achievement Award«. The Max Steiner Film Music Achievement Award« 2013 was given to James Horner. The son of the Viennese stage designer and later Oscar-winning Hollywood set designer Harry Horner belongs to today's best known and most versatile film composers. His awards include two Academy _Awards_ (qv), seven Oscar nominations, two Golden Globe _Awards_ (qv) (eight nominations) and three Grammy _Awards_ (qv) (eight nominations). During the gala concert James Horner's musical highlights, like »Titanic«, »Avatar«, »Star Trek« and more were performed.::Sandra Tomek
